content.description: Consider the following method that is intended to modify its parameter nameList by replacing all occurrences of name with newValue.
content.question: public void replace(ArrayList<String> nameList, String name, String newValue) { for (int j = 0; j < nameList.size(); j++) { if ( /* expression */ ) { nameList.set(j, newValue); } } } Which of the following can be used to replace /* expression */ so that replace will work as intended?

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
